backend/main.mo: Defines an order-management canister with creation, retrieval, listing, and UPI reference update functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a hero image path change request and associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in a forced-dark ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with product info, support details, social links, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout providing the luxury background, navigation, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Top navigation bar with branding and a Buy Now button linking to checkout.
frontend/src/components/orders/UPIRefere: Form for entering and submitting a UPI payment reference, with validation and navigation on success.
frontend/src/components/sections/Feature: Displays five product features with icons and scroll-reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner showing product name, price, CTA, and tilting product image using the centralized hero image source.
frontend/src/components/sections/OfferSe: Displays a promotional offer section with animated reveal, discounted pricing, and a checkout button.
frontend/src/components/sections/TrustSe: Shows trust badges with scroll animations highlighting replacement and free shipping policies.
frontend/src/components/upi/UPIPaymentPa: Renders a UPI payment panel with QR code, payment link, and order amount details.
frontend/src/config/upi.ts: Defines static UPI configuration including VPA, payee name, and transaction note.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for creating orders, fetching orders, and submitting UPI reference numbers.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Implements an intersection-based hook to reveal elements when scrolled into view.
frontend/src/hooks/useTilt.ts: Adds mouse-based 3D tilt effects to an element unless reduced motion is preferred.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, base styles, and dark mode behavior.
frontend/src/lib/pricing.ts: Exports product constants and a helper to compute total price based on quantity.
frontend/src/lib/upi.ts: Generates a UPI payment link using configured merchant details and order information.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements the checkout form, validates input, creates orders, and navigates to the order page.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Assembles the landing page by rendering hero, features, offer, and trust sections.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order details after checkout, shows UPI payment steps if no reference is provided, and confirms payment when a reference exists.
Shows a confirmation message after a UPI reference is submitted and outlines next steps for verification and shipping.

project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, features, and known issues for the ecommerce site build.
